name: Extend Enchantment
description: Any buffs you currently have are extended by 1 turn. Any debuffs your opponent has are extended by 1 turn.

immediateEffect.script: int buffCount = 0; int debuffCount = 0; foreach (var status in GetStatuses(Player)) { if (status.IsBuff) { status.Duration += 1; buffCount++; } } foreach (var status in GetStatuses(Opponent)) { if (!status.IsBuff) { status.Duration += 1; debuffCount++; } } Log(PlayerDisplayName + " extends " + buffCount + " buffs and " + debuffCount + " debuffs!");
